1074813944039178241.text:
ELI5: randomness in Ethereum 2.0 using a VDF

100 people, one by one, (re)roll dice placed in a dark room. After the last person lights turn on, revealing a fair random number. The Verifiable Delay Function (VDF) ensures lights aren't turned on early.

Now, Ethereum is not only securing value ...

1065239059465945088.text:
The point of this industry is to do the *hard* thing instead. To find new ways to structure core incentive/coordination systems themselves.

Make sure you aren't taking the easy path. It would be extremely disappointing if all we accomplished was to recreate the old system.

fin/

1065239057779867648.text:
The problem isn't that these aren't real issues or that these approaches don't work. Because they are and they do.

The problem is that they are the easy solution. They fix the symptom but not the cause. (The societal equivalent of taking advil for your dehydration headache)

3/

1059941024443719681.text: Anyone can add liquidity for an ERC20 by providing equivalent fiat value of that ERC20 and ETH at the time. Grateful for these people and the ideas we circle around. 

It is rare to find a community with such high quality listeners. Gatherings like this facilitate ideation and initiatives that wouldnt occur otherwise.

1058515221638189062.text: “These times of coming together have these qualities of glee about them, and that’s what makes them go...” - Stewart Brand on how movements develop. @EFDevcon absolutely inspired times of glee... what a movement this has become
